name: voucherEntryWithSingleMultipleLines

testSteps.description: Given that I'm logged in to Voucher Entry page

children.description: When i open page from sidebar menu: {Accounts Payable,Voucher Entries,Voucher Entry}

testSteps.description: Then the Payment Information form and its contents should show up
When I set the Supplier to '133339'
When I set the 'Invoice Number' to 'rzSoAoylGq'
When I set the Currency to 'USD'

exception.message:
Expected condition failed: waiting for visibility of all elements located by By.xpath:  .//div[contains(@class, 'form-item')][span[text()='Currency']]//div[contains(@class, 'Select-option')] | .//div[contains(@class, 'form-item')][span[contains(text(), 'Currency')]]//div[contains(@class, 'Select-option')] (tried for 120 second(s) with 100 milliseconds interval)
Build info: version: '3.141.59', revision: 'e82be7d358', time: '2018-11-14T08:17:03'
System info: host: 'PCS15848', ip: '192.168.1.12', os.name: 'Windows 10', os.arch: 'amd64', os.version: '10.0', java.version: '1.8.0_392'
Driver info: net.thucydides.core.webdriver.WebDriverFacade

testSteps.description: When i click on continue button
When I select the first Bank Account and click 'Submit' button if modal exist
When I set the Gross Amount to '15000'
When I set the Payment Terms to '30'
When I set the Tax Area to 'KF7'
Then the tax amount of the first line should be filled out
When i click on continue button
Then the 'GL Distribution' form and its contents should show up
When I fill up the last row line using Account Number: '91100', Line Description: 'Test', Amount: '5000', Cost Center: '1MAN400', Gen Obj: 'AFGHAI', AOE: 'YAO', Line Ref: 'Test1'
When I duplicate the previous row and set the amount to '5000'
When I duplicate the previous row and set the amount equal to the remaining balance
Then the voucher entry successfully created modal and its contents should show up

title: Voucher entry with single multiple lines
